ygData.subject: Re: Faction shmaction
ygData.msgSnippet: If the guards in Kaladim attacked your group or what not, I can only conclude it is because one of you killed too many Krags and Krag Chicks found in the
ygData.messageBody:
If the guards in Kaladim attacked your group or what not, I can only
conclude it is because one of you killed too many Krags and Krag Chicks found
in the Butcherblocks. The guards seem to adore those nasty little critters.

The same goes for killing too many Pixies in Greater Faydark. The
Kelethin Guards, (as idiotic as they are), will attack you on sight if you
kill too many.

Well, this is what I have been told anywho. :-)

Your tree-huggin' flower smellin' all around nature dude,
Fennris, Soldier of Tunare.
-- HIGHLY anticipating Spirit of the Wolf at Level 14...
wooo.... just 4 more...
